charges.charge_description: 18:2252.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF MINORS (Computer Transmission of Child Pornography - 18:2252(a)(1))(1s-4s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment of 78 months on each of Cts 1s,2s,3s,4s &; 5s, to be served concurrently. Supervised Release of 60 months on Cts 1s, 2s, 3s &; 4s and 36 months on Ct 5s, to be served concurrently. $500 Special Assessment. Deft remanded to custody of US Marshal.

charges.charge_description: 18:2252.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF MINORS (Possession of Child Pornography - 18:2252(a)(4)(B))(5s)

charges.charge_disposition: Imprisonment of 78 months on each of Cts 1s,2s,3s,4s &; 5s, to be served concurrently. Supervised Release of 60 months on Cts 1s, 2s, 3s &; 4s and 36 months on Ct 5s, to be served concurrently. $500 Special Assessment. Deft remanded to custody of US Marshal.
